questions.question: What type of startup are you working on?
Is your startup focused more on solving a problem or creating a new opportunity?
Does your startup fall under B2B, B2C, or B2B2C?
What is your target market?
Have you validated the need for your product in this market?
Is your target audience defined by geography, industry, or user behavior?
What makes your startup unique (USP)?
Is your USP based on technology, pricing, access, or experience?
Do competitors currently offer something similar?
What is your estimated available capital?
Are you planning to raise external capital in the next 6–12 months?
What portion of your available capital are you comfortable investing initially?
Do you have pricing tiers or packages in mind?
Do you plan to monetize from day one or later?
Do you have a defined revenue model?
Is your timeline flexible if market or development delays arise?
Do you plan a full launch or a beta/MVP release first?
Which platform do you expect most user traffic from?
Do you require native apps or hybrid solutions?
Do you want support in defining your GTM strategy?
Do you want CreAIt to help manage operations too?
Do you need help with branding & visual identity?
Do you want help preparing investor outreach & pitch decks?
What funding structure are you open to?
Would you need help with customer service, logistics, or admin?
Are you open to a co-founder-as-a-service model?

How many co-founders or core team members are currently active?

What are your personal strengths or skills?

Would you be interested in founder coaching or mentorship to fill gaps?
